<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Ravithra](/Articles.aspx?ID=32)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #161: Belly of the Black Whale](/Sources.aspx?ID=51) pg. 70

Learn the lore of [Ravithra](/Deities.aspx?ID=218), corrupted deity of the [nagas](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=75), and her quest to regain the power she believes is her due!
